hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah has ninety-nine Names, i.e., one hundred minus one, and whoever believes in their meanings and acts accordingly, will enter Paradise; and Allah is witr (one) and loves 'the witr' (i.e., odd numbers)

chapter.ara-name: باب لِلَّهِ مِائَةُ اسْمٍ غَيْرَ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: Allah has one hundred Names less one
